HeroData.title: Modular pricing. {{highlight}}Enterprise flexibility. {{/highlight}}
HeroData.subtitle: xMatix pricing is designed to adapt to how your organization executes operations. Start with the platform, add the modules you need, and scale usage and intelligence as execution grows.

whatIsIt.title: How Pricing Works
whatIsIt.description1: xMatix pricing is built around two core components: a shared execution platform and the operational modules that run on it.
whatIsIt.description2: You pay once for the platform foundation and add modules as needed. Pricing scales based on execution usage and operational scope, not static user licenses.

pricingData.subtitle: Plans define the breadth of platform capabilities, governance controls, and scale limits. Modules can be added to any plan.

features: Suitable for single use case or pilot

faqs.question: How is pricing calculated?
faqs.answer: Pricing is based on platform usage, execution scope, enabled modules, and add-ons.

faqs.question: Can we start small and scale later?
faqs.answer: Yes. xMatix is designed for incremental adoption without replatforming.

faqs.question: Do modules require separate platform fees?
faqs.answer: No. All modules run on the same shared platform.

faqs.question: Is Sense required?
faqs.answer: No. Sense can be added when and where intelligence is needed.

faqs.question: Do you offer enterprise pricing and SLAs?
faqs.answer: Yes. Enterprise plans support custom deployment, compliance, and SLAs.
